verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> when the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> was <S%H7918>appeased,<s%> he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H2060>Vashti,<s%> and <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> she had <S%H6213>done,<s%> and <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> was <S%H1504>decreed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5288>servants<s%> that <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to him, Let there be <S%H2896>fair<s%> <S%H4758><s%> <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> for the <S%H4428>king:<s%>

And let the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H6496>officers<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> that they may <S%H6908>gather<s%> together <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2896>fair<s%> <S%H4758><s%> <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%> to <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H802>women,<s%> to the <S%H3027>custody<s%> of <S%H1896>Hege<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5631>chamberlain,<s%> <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H802>women;<s%> and let their <S%H1697>things<s%> for <S%H8562>purification<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> them:

And let the <S%H5291>maiden<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3190>pleases<s%> <S%H5869><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> be <S%H4427>queen<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H2060>Vashti.<s%> And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> the <S%H4428>king;<s%> and he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

Now in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace<s%> there was a <S%H376>certain<s%> <S%H3064>Jew,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> a <S%H1145>Benjamite;<s%>

<S%H834>Who<s%> had been <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H1546>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had been <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H1546>away<s%> with <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H1546>away.<s%>

And he <S%H539>brought<s%> up <S%H1919>Hadassah,<s%> that is, <S%H635>Esther,<s%> his <S%H1733>uncle's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter:<s%> for she had <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> nor <S%H517>mother,<s%> and the <S%H5291>maid<s%> was <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H8389><s%> and <S%H2896>beautiful;<s%> <S%H4758><s%> whom <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> when her <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H517>mother<s%> were <S%H4194>dead,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> for his own <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>commandment<s%> and his <S%H1881>decree<s%> was <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and when <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5291>maidens<s%> were <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together to <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace,<s%> to the <S%H3027>custody<s%> of <S%H1896>Hegai,<s%> that <S%H635>Esther<s%> was <S%H3947>brought<s%> also to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H3027>custody<s%> of <S%H1896>Hegai,<s%> <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H802>women.<s%>

And the <S%H5291>maiden<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> him, and she <S%H5375>obtained<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of him; and he <S%H926>speedily<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> her her <S%H1697>things<s%> for <S%H8562>purification,<s%> with such <S%H1697>things<s%> as <S%H4490>belonged<s%> to her, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5291>maidens,<s%> which were <S%H7200>meet<s%> to be <S%H5414>given<s%> her, out of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> and he <S%H8138>preferred<s%> her and her <S%H5291>maids<s%> to the <S%H2896>best<s%> place of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H802>women.<s%>
<S%H635>Esther<s%> had not <S%H5046>showed<s%> her <S%H5971>people<s%> nor her <S%H4138>kindred:<s%> for <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> had <S%H6680>charged<s%> her that she should not <S%H5046>show<s%> it.

And <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> every <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H802>women's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> how <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H7965>did,<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> should <S%H6213>become<s%> of her.

Now when every <S%H5291>maid's<s%> <S%H8447>turn<s%> was <S%H5060>come<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> <S%H7093>after<s%> that she had <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>months,<s%> according to the <S%H1881>manner<s%> of the <S%H802>women,<s%> (for <S%H3651>so<s%> were the <S%H3117>days<s%> of their <S%H4795>purifications<s%> <S%H4390>accomplished,<s%> to wit, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> with <S%H1314>sweet<s%> <S%H1314>odors,<s%> and with other <S%H1697>things<s%> for the <S%H8562>purifying<s%> of the <S%H802>women;<s%>)

Then <S%H2088>thus<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> every <S%H5291>maiden<s%> to the <S%H4428>king;<s%> <S%H853>whatever<s%> she <S%H559>desired<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> her to <S%H935>go<s%> with her out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H802>women<s%> to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

In the <S%H6153>evening<s%> she <S%H935>went,<s%> and on the <S%H1242>morrow<s%> she <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H802>women,<s%> to the <S%H3027>custody<s%> of <S%H8190>Shaashgaz,<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5631>chamberlain,<s%> which <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H6370>concubines:<s%> she <S%H935>came<s%> in to the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in her, and that she were <S%H7121>called<s%> by <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Now when the <S%H8447>turn<s%> of <S%H635>Esther,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail<s%> the <S%H1730>uncle<s%> of <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> her for his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> was <S%H5060>come<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> in to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> she <S%H1245>required<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H1697><s%> but <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H1896>Hegai<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5631>chamberlain,<s%> the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H559>appointed.<s%> And <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H5375>obtained<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H6437>looked<s%> on her.

So <S%H635>Esther<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4438>royal<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> which is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H2887>Tebeth,<s%> in the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4438>reign.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%> above <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>women,<s%> and she <S%H5375>obtained<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> and <S%H2617>favor<s%> in his <S%H6440>sight<s%> more than <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1330>virgins;<s%> so that he <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H3804>crown<s%> on her <S%H7218>head,<s%> and made her <S%H4427>queen<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H2060>Vashti.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4960>feast<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8269>princes<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H635>Esther's<s%> <S%H4960>feast;<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2010>release<s%> to the <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4864>gifts,<s%> according to the <S%H3027>state<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
And when the <S%H1330>virgins<s%> were <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, then <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

<S%H635>Esther<s%> had not yet <S%H5046>showed<s%> her <S%H4138>kindred<s%> nor her <S%H5971>people;<s%> as <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> had <S%H6680>charged<s%> her: for <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H3982>commandment<s%> of <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> like as <S%H834>when<s%> she was <S%H539>brought<s%> up with him.

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> while <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5631>chamberlains,<s%> <S%H904>Bigthan<s%> and <S%H8657>Teresh,<s%> of those which <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H5592>door,<s%> were <S%H7107>wroth,<s%> and <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus.<s%>

And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> who <S%H5046>told<s%> it to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen;<s%> and <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H559>certified<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof in <S%H4782>Mordecai's<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And when <S%H1245>inquisition<s%> was made of the <S%H1697>matter,<s%> it was <S%H4672>found<s%> out; therefore they were <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H8518>hanged<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H6086>tree:<s%> and it was <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
